Interface InMeetingWaitingRoomController


  • public interface InMeetingWaitingRoomController
    Waiting Room of Meeting Service Interface

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(InMeetingWaitingRoomController.InMeetingWaitingRoomListener listener)
        Register a listener for meeting waiting room callback.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener instance.

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(InMeetingWaitingRoomController.InMeetingWaitingRoomListener listener)
        Unregister the listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener instance

      • isSupportWaitingRoom

        boolean isSupportWaitingRoom()
        Query if it is able to enable waiting room in the current meeting.
        Returns:
        TRUE means supports. FALSE not.

      • isSupportWaitingRoomUponEntryFeature

        boolean isSupportWaitingRoomUponEntryFeature()
        Query if it is able to put attendees in waiting room in current meeting.
        Returns:
        TRUE means able. FALSE not.

      • isWaitingRoomOnEntryFlagOn

        boolean isWaitingRoomOnEntryFlagOn()
        Query if it is able to make the attendees enter waiting room when they join the current meeting.
        Returns:
        TRUE means enabled. FALSE not.

      • enableWaitingRoomOnEntry

        MobileRTCSDKError enableWaitingRoomOnEntry(boolean bEnable)
        Enable the feature to put attendees in waiting room when they enter the current meeting.
        Parameters:
        bEnable - TRUE means to enable waiting room. FALSE not.
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success. Otherwise failed, for more details, see MobileRTCSDKError.

      • getWaitingRoomUserLst

        java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getWaitingRoomUserLst()
        Get the list of meeting participants in the waiting room.
        Returns:
        The ID list of all the participants in the waiting room. If there is nobody in the waiting room, returns NULL.

      • getWaitingRoomUserInfoByID

        InMeetingUserInfo getWaitingRoomUserInfoByID(long userId)
        Get the information of user who is in the waiting room by user ID.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user ID.
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success. Otherwise failed, for more details, see MobileRTCSDKError.

      • admitToMeeting

        MobileRTCSDKError admitToMeeting(long userId)
        Allow user to join the meeting.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of user who is allowed to join the meeting.
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success. Otherwise failed, for more details, see MobileRTCSDKError.

      • putInWaitingRoom

        MobileRTCSDKError putInWaitingRoom(long userId)
        Put user into waiting room.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of user who will be put into the waiting room.
        Returns:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is SDKErr_Success. Otherwise failed, for more details, see MobileRTCSDKError.
